body.transcript:
Hello! Thank you for calling Green Valley Sporting Goods. My name is Sara. How can I assist you today? May I ask your name?

Hi Sara, my name is John. I'm looking for some information about your store.

Thank you for calling us, John! What can I help you with today?

I'm interested in buying a treadmill. I wanted to know what models you have available.

Sure, we have several models available. Can I ask for your ZIP code to check the availability in your area?

My ZIP code is two zero zero one five.

Thank you, John. We have the latest Pro Runner and FlexStride models available at our store near you.

Great, can you also tell me if there's any ongoing promotion or discount on treadmills?

Absolutely! We currently have a promotion where you get a ten percent discount if you purchase using our store credit card. Would you like me to send you more information to your email?

Yes, that would be helpful. Please send it to john.doe@example.com.

Thank you, John. I'll send the information right away. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

No, that's all for now. Thank you for your help.

You're welcome, John! Thank you for calling Green Valley Sporting Goods. Have a great day!

You're welcome, John! Thank you for calling Green Valley Sporting Goods. Have a great day!
